attr.title: sneggpit
attr.desc:
Oh no, your friend Cursy has fallen into a pit full of dangerous snakes! Help Cursy to evade the hungry reptiles, steal the snakes' eggs and prevent them from spawning. 
Sneggpit is a charming little arcade game that could have rocked the early eighties - but is brand-new from 2023! While taking some inspiration from all-time classics such as Pacman or Nibbler/Snake, Sneggpit stands out with
its unique and highly addictive gameplay and instantly runs on almost any modern device.
attr.inst: Cursy's movements can be controlled using the cursor keys (of course!), by any game controller, or via swipe gestures on mobile devices.
